main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported in Buffalo, NY, with descriptions of metallic, pear-shaped, and round objects seen hovering, descending, and moving in the sky over a period of several years.
interesting points: One sighting reported a metallic object in the southwest stationary for 5 minutes, possibly identified as Venus by official conclusions.
Another sighting described objects larger than stars, moving in the sky and in sight for 15 minutes, categorized as caused by stars.
Descriptions included a round object 13 times larger than a star, white in color, with three objects observed, one on top of each other.
Observations were made using binoculars, and local fighter jets were deployed to investigate, but saw only stars, leading to the conclusion that the observed objects were likely stars.
The sightings spanned a number of years, with reports coming from civilians, including a truck driver and a farmer.
sighted object: Various unidentified objects including metallic, pear-shaped, and round objects
witnesses: Civilians including a truck driver and a farmer
